required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Single Ascending Dose Study to Assess Safety, Tolerability, Pharmacokinetics and Pharmacodynamics of HM15912 in Healthy Korean Subjects
clinical_study.official_title: A First-in-Human, Double-blind, Randomized, Placebo-controlled, Single Ascending Dose Study to Assess Safety, Tolerability, Pharmacokinetics and Pharmacodynamics of HM15912 in Healthy Korean Subjects

brief_summary.textblock: A First-in-Human, Double-blind, Randomized, Placebo-controlled, Single Ascending Dose Study to Assess Safety, Tolerability, Pharmacokinetics and Pharmacodynamics of HM15912 in Healthy Korean Subjects

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.measure: To assess the safety and tolerability of HM15912 after single subcutaneous (SC) doses
primary_outcome.time_frame: after single subcutaneous (SC) doses for 44 days

intervention.description: The study will be conducted in approximately 5 sequential dosing cohorts, enrolling 8 subjects per cohort. Subjects will be randomized to HM15912 or placebo in a ratio of 6:2 (6 active, 2 placebo).
The study will be conducted in approximately 5 sequential dosing cohorts, enrolling 8 subjects per cohort. Subjects will be randomized to HM15912 or placebo in a ratio of 6:2 (6 active, 2 placebo).

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Subject voluntarily agrees to participate in this study and signs an IRB-approved informed consent prior to performing any of the Screening visit procedures.
- Korean males and females ≥ 19 and ≤ 60 years of age at the Screening visit
Exclusion Criteria:
- Subject with a history or presence of clinically significant active diseases.
- Subject who has participated in other clinical studies (including bioequivalence tests) within 6 months before the Screening visit and has received IPs
